scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin find_your_match.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/find_your_match.html && usemin how_it_works.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/how_it_works.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin mentoring.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/mentoring.html && usemin resources.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/resources.html
